title: Ratio of gravitational force from moon

content.question: Two moons of equal mass are in circular orbits around a planet. Moon 1 orbits with a radius of r and moon 2 orbits with a radius of 3r. What is the ratio of the magnitude of the planetâ€™s gravitational force on moon 2 to that on moon 1, FG(on 2) / FG(on 1)?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
